channel.title: Requirments, in order to weild a weapon
channel.description: How could I make it so that if you arent a staff member, you cannot weild a certain weapon?

item.title: Requirments, in order to weild a weapon
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

What? I want to make it so you cant WEILD a weapon if your not a staff member

A CERTAIN weapon, not all :p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2008, 07:17:49 am[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
